reports_summary: User feedback indicates the game feels smooth on the Valve Steam Deck OLED when pushed toward a higher frame goal; the report recommends aiming for about 90 FPS to cut input lag on parries and dodges. Running at the device’s default resolution with the renderer set high but shadow and effect detail trimmed to medium kept frame delivery steady, and V‑Sync was used to help stability. The single community entry rated performance very highly, so players who prioritise snappy controls should favour the higher frame target over cranking every visual option.
